what_you_do: Stacey Chillemi is an entrepreneur, bestselling author, speaker & coach. She is the founder of The Complete Herbal Guide.
who_you_serve: Hundreds of thousands of people have enjoyed the warmth, humor, and transformational power of Chillemi's health and personal development events, articles, and books for over two decades.
social_proof: Chillemi has had over 20 books published. She wrote for the Huffington Post (working personally with Ariana Huffington), Huff Post, and Thrive Global and has been a guest on the Dr. Oz Show 5 times, local news, and numerous radio shows. She was chosen as one of the Top 10 Entrepreneurs in 2023 at Apple News.
business_focus: Stacey Chillemi is an entrepreneur, bestselling author, speaker & coach who has empowered hundreds of thousands worldwide through her books, websites, e-courses, educational videos, and live events.
